TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ViewStateService extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許保留與存取與工作流程應用程式之使用者互動元件關聯的所有資料值 (在執行中之工作流程應用程式的特定時間點)。

span.span: Enables the preservation and accessing of all data values associated with the user interaction components of a workflow application, at a particular point in time in the running of a workflow application.

summary.span: 會儲存模型項目的檢視狀態。

span.span: A stores view states for model items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這相當實用，讓狀態可以在應用程式的控制使用回傳進出時持續進行擷取。This is useful so that the state can keep being retrieved when control of the application goes and comes with postbacks. 這是抽象類別。 is an abstract class. 呼叫 時，衍生類別必須儲存檢視狀態，而呼叫 時，則必須擷取這些檢視狀態。Derived classes must store view states when is called, and retrieve them when is called.

summary.span: 在衍生類別內實作時，記錄指定之索引鍵表示之項目的目前設定，讓該設定能夠提供給復原作業使用。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, records the current setting of the item represented by the specified key so that it is available for an undo operation.

summary.span: 接著，以指定之索引鍵表示的項目會儲存在指定之模型項目的檢視狀態中。

span.span: The item represented by the specified key is then stored in the view state of the specified model item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫 並傳遞 `modelItem` 和 `key` 的相同值，以擷取已儲存的物件。You can retrieve the stored object by calling and passing the same values for `modelItem` and `key`.

summary.span: 在衍生類別內實作時，宣告針對可復原之控制項檢視狀態變更發出訊號的事件。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, declares an event that signals that a change has been made to the control's undoable view state.

summary.span: 在衍生類別內實作時，宣告針對控制項檢視狀態變更發出訊號的事件。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, declares an event that signals that a change has been made to the control's view state.
